meanings.definition: The art or process of binding books.
meanings.sent1: Bookbinding requires skill and patience to create beautiful books.
meanings.sent2: I learned bookbinding techniques in my art class.
meanings.sent3: The bookbinding expert could turn any pile of papers into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail in bookbinding was like a symphony of precision.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh glue filled the room during the bookbinding workshop.

meanings.definition: The cover and fastenings of a book.
meanings.sent1: The bookbinding of this novel is made of leather and gold accents.
meanings.sent2: I love the intricate designs on the bookbinding of old books.
meanings.sent3: The bookbinding on that book is so fancy, it looks like a royal robe.
meanings.sent4: The bookbinding on her favorite book was worn from years of reading.
meanings.sent5: The bookbinding on the antique book was so delicate, it felt like holding history in my hands.
